item.title: Ubuntu Server 12.04 + Slurm 2.5.7 fatnodes
item.description: SLURM (Simple Linux Utility for Resource Management) â€” job scheduler and resource manager usually installed on supercomputers. For example, it runs on Lomonosov supercomputer in MSU, Moscow, Russia.

item.title: Setting up RhodeCode on Ubuntu 12.04
item.description: This howto is based on a great guide with modifications. All settings are made for server domain hg.kenarius.org. You can replace it with your one easily.
